basics.name: Jeanne Chan
basics.label: Software Engineer and Ceramicist
basics.summary: Hi! I am an Information Technology Specialist at University of Hawai'i System and a member of Hawai'i Potters' Guild

work.position: Information Technology Support Specialist and Web Developer
highlights: Configure and maintain software and security on devices for all 10 campuses in Hawai’i
Compose and improve technical documentation for internal and external operating procedures
Modify user data access using BMT
Developing software using Cascade, XML, Velocity, CSS, and Work Flows
Manage student staff in the operations center
Train staff, faculty, and student personnel at assigned departments on use of IT hardware/software, audio/visual, and other peripheral equipment
Monitor the status, performance, and availability of essential production resources, including the UH network, enterprise systems, ITS Data Center facilities, and scheduled jobs
Maintains control of and accounts for whereabouts and safety of children and youth
Plans, coordinates, and conducts activities that meet the physical, social, emotional and cognitive needs for program participants based on the group and individual children and youth
Establishes a program environment that sustains participant interest and promotes positive interactions with other children, youth, and adults
Maintains program participation data and complete daily report

work.company: University of Minnesota: Office of Information Technology
highlights: Oversee 90+ student staff, and act as a liaison between student staff, managers, and service owners
Train new staff and training mentors on standard procedures
Answer phone calls, chats, emails, and in-person requests assisting anyone affiliated with the University with technical issues
Documented new procedures
Lead meetings about updates and news on student staff or repeating requests or issues
Worked alongside senior software engineer in multiple teams primarily using Java, Golang, and Angular
Implemented new Apple features and maintaining existing services for Jamf Pro
Refactored the 802.1x certificate authority and signing certificate process
Attended quality insight meetings with UI/UX designers
Created a website using Angular
Conducted and created activities for dementia residents
Assisted feeding during meal times

volunteer.summary: Aid in cleaning the studio, loading kilns, and creating art for community events

volunteer.organization: Association for Computing Machinery for Women (ACM-W)

volunteer.summary: Created prosthetic limbs unique for a patient's needs, using a 3D printer

awards.title: President's Emerging Scholarship
awards.summary: A scholarship awarded to first generation college students who are academically on track for graduation

awards.title: Minnesota Aspirations in Computing State Winner
